SEARCH:
程序包 ltseed.chatinmc.PlayerInteraction.GUI

类 Button

java.lang.Object
ltseed.chatinmc.PlayerInteraction.GUI.Button
public abstract class Button extends Object
This class represents a clickable inventory item that can be used to trigger a specific action when clicked by a player.

The class provides methods to create an ItemStack representing the item, set the display name, lore, material, and skull owner.

It also provides a method to reset the item's slot position in the inventory and a method to trigger the item's action when clicked.

The class uses the Bukkit API to create and modify ItemStacks and to handle player interactions.

版本:
1.0
作者:
LtSeed

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Button

      public Button(short x, short y, org.bukkit.Material material, String displayName, List<String> lore)
      Constructs a button with the given coordinates, material, display name, and lore.
      参数:
      x - the x coordinate of the button
      y - the y coordinate of the button
      material - the material of the button
      displayName - the display name of the button
      lore - the lore of the button

    • Button

      public Button(int slot, org.bukkit.Material material, String displayName, List<String> lore)
      Constructs a button with the given slot, material, display name, and lore.
      参数:
      slot - the slot in the inventory where the button should be placed
      material - the material of the button
      displayName - the display name of the button
      lore - the lore of the button

    • Button

      public Button(int slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack is)
      Constructs a button with the given slot and item stack.
      参数:
      slot - the slot in the inventory where the button should be placed
      is - the item stack of the button

    • readTexture

      private String readTexture(File imageFile)
      Reads the texture file and encodes it to Base64.
      参数:
      imageFile - The file containing the image to read and encode.
      返回:
      A Base64 encoded string representation of the image.

    • createSkullItemStack

      private org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack createSkullItemStack(UUID owner, String displayName, List<String> lore, String texture)
      Creates a skull item stack with the given parameters.
      参数:
      owner - The UUID of the skull's owner.
      displayName - The display name of the skull item stack.
      lore - The lore of the skull item stack.
      texture - The Base64 encoded texture of the skull item stack.
      返回:
      An ItemStack representing the skull item stack.

      What to do when button is pressed.
      参数:
      player - the called player

    • resetSlot

      public void resetSlot(int slot)
      Resets the slot position of the item in the inventory to the specified position.
      参数:
      slot - the slot position of the item in the inventory

    • callOnce

      public void callOnce(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      What to do when button is pressed. This method only call once.
      参数:
      player - the called player
